mil.nga.giat.geowave.core.store

Interface DataStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumuloDataStore, RasterDataStore, VectorDataStore

    public interface DataStore
    A DataStore can both ingest and query data based on persisted indices and data adapters. When the data is ingested it is explicitly given an index and a data adapter which is then persisted to be used in subsequent queries.

      • createIndexWriter

        <T> IndexWriter createIndexWriter(Index index)
        Returns an index writer to perform batched write operations
        Parameters:
        index - The configuration information for the primary index to use.
        Returns:
        Returns the index writer which can be used for batch write operations

      • ingest

        <T> List<ByteArrayId> ingest(WritableDataAdapter<T> writableAdapter,
                           Index index,
                           T entry)
        Ingests a single entry into the data store
        Parameters:
        writableAdapter - The writable adapter that allows the data store to translate the entry into a persistable format
        index - The configuration information for the primary index to use.
        entry - The entry to ingest
        Returns:
        Returns all row IDs for which the entry is ingested

      • ingest

        <T> void ingest(WritableDataAdapter<T> writableAdapter,
              Index index,
              Iterator<T> entryIterator)
        Ingests a collection of entries into the data store described by an iterator on the entries
        Parameters:
        writableAdapter - The writable adapter that allows the data store to translate the entries into a persistable format
        index - The configuration information for the primary index to use.
        entryIterator - An iterator on the entries to ingest

      • ingest

        <T> List<ByteArrayId> ingest(WritableDataAdapter<T> writableAdapter,
                           Index index,
                           T entry,
                           VisibilityWriter<T> customFieldVisibilityWriter)
        Ingests a single entry into the data store
        Parameters:
        writableAdapter - The writable adapter that allows the data store to translate the entry into a persistable format
        index - The configuration information for the primary index to use.
        entry - The entry to ingest
        customFieldVisibilityWriter - per entry visibility control
        Returns:
        Returns all row IDs for which the entry is ingested

      • ingest

        <T> void ingest(WritableDataAdapter<T> writableAdapter,
              Index index,
              Iterator<T> entryIterator,
              IngestCallback<T> ingestCallback)
        Ingests a collection of entries into the data store described by an iterator on the entries
        Parameters:
        writableAdapter - The writable adapter that allows the data store to translate the entries into a persistable format
        index - The configuration information for the primary index to use.
        entryIterator - An iterator on the entries to ingest
        ingestCallback - A callback method to receive feedback such as row IDs for every entry that is successfully ingested

      • ingest

        <T> void ingest(WritableDataAdapter<T> writableAdapter,
              Index index,
              Iterator<T> entryIterator,
              IngestCallback<T> ingestCallback,
              VisibilityWriter<T> customFieldVisibilityWriter)
        Ingests a collection of entries into the data store described by an iterator on the entries
        Parameters:
        writableAdapter - The writable adapter that allows the data store to translate the entries into a persistable format
        index - The configuration information for the primary index to use.
        entryIterator - An iterator on the entries to ingest
        ingestCallback - A callback method to receive feedback such as row IDs for every entry that is successfully ingested
        customFieldVisibilityWriter - per entry visibility control

      • query

        CloseableIterator<?> query(Query query)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter. All indices that are supported by the query will be queried and all data types that match the query will be returned as an instance of the native data type that was originally ingested.
        Parameters:
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • getEntry

        @Deprecated
<T> T getEntry(Index index,
                        ByteArrayId rowId)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the data element associated with the given row ID stored in the given index
        Parameters:
        index - The index to search for the entry.
        rowId - The full row ID to use as the query.
        Returns:
        The entry that was ingested with the given row ID. This row ID is the one assigned to the entry on ingest into the given index. Null is returned if the row ID does not match any entries in the data store for the given index.

      • getEntry

        <T> T getEntry(Index index,
             ByteArrayId dataId,
             ByteArrayId adapterId,
             String... additionalAuthorizations)
        Returns the data element associated with the given data ID and adapter ID stored in the given index
        Parameters:
        index - The index to search for the entry.
        dataId - The data ID to use for the query.
        adapterId - The adapter ID to use for the query.
        authorizations - additional authorizations to fetch the entry
        Returns:
        The entry that was ingested with the given data ID and adapter ID. This combination of data ID and adapter ID is the one assigned to the entry on ingest into the given index. Null is returned if the data ID and adapter ID do not match any entries in the data store for the given index.

      • deleteEntry

        boolean deleteEntry(Index index,
                  ByteArrayId dataId,
                  ByteArrayId adapterId,
                  String... authorizations)
        Deletes the data element associated with the given data ID and adapter ID stored in the given index
        Parameters:
        index - The index to search for the entry.
        dataId - The data ID to use for the query.
        adapterId - The adapter ID to use for the query.
        authorizations - additional authorizations to delete the entry
        Returns:
        Returns true if the entry was found and deleted successfully. Returns false if the entry could not be found, if the entry could not be deleted, or if the entry in the alternate index could not be deleted.

      • getEntriesByPrefix

        <T> CloseableIterator<T> getEntriesByPrefix(Index index,
                                          ByteArrayId rowPrefix,
                                          String... authorizations)
        Returns all data with the given row ID prefix stored in the given index
        Parameters:
        index - The index to search for the entry.
        rowPrefix - A prefix for the row ID to use as the query.
        additionalAuthorizations - additional authorizations to any data store specific defaults
        Returns:
        All entries that were ingested with a row ID that is prefixed by the given rowPrefix. The "row ID" is the one assigned to the entry on ingest into the given index.

      • query

        <T> CloseableIterator<T> query(DataAdapter<T> adapter,
                             Query query)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter and matches the adapter (the same adapter ID as the ID ingested). All indices that are supported by the query will be queried and returned as an instance of the native data type that this adapter supports.
        Parameters:
        adapter - the data adapter to use for the query
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • query

        <T> CloseableIterator<T> query(Index index,
                             Query query)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter within the index described by the index passed in. All data types that match the query will be returned as an instance of the native data type that was originally ingested.
        Parameters:
        index - The index information to query against. All data within the index of this index ID will be queried and returned.
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • query

        <T> CloseableIterator<T> query(DataAdapter<T> adapter,
                             Index index,
                             Query query)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter within the index described by the index passed in and matches the adapter (the same adapter ID as the ID ingested). All data that matches the query, adapter ID, and is in the index ID will be returned as an instance of the native data type that this adapter supports.
        Parameters:
        adapter - the data adapter to use for the query
        index - The index information to query against. All data within the index of this index ID will be queried and returned.
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • query

        CloseableIterator<?> query(List<ByteArrayId> adapterIds,
                         Query query)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter and matches one of the adapter IDs. All data types that match the query and one of the adapter IDs will be returned as an instance of the native data type that was originally ingested.
        Parameters:
        adapterIds - The data adapter IDs to use for the query - only data that matches one of these adapter IDs will be returned
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • query

        CloseableIterator<?> query(Query query,
                         int limit)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter. All indices that are supported by the query will be queried and all data types that match the query will be returned as an instance of the native data type that was originally ingested. The iterator will only return as many results as the limit passed in.
        Parameters:
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        limit - The maximum number of entries to return
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • query

        <T> CloseableIterator<T> query(DataAdapter<T> adapter,
                             Query query,
                             int limit)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter and matches the adapter (the same adapter ID as the ID ingested). All indices that are supported by the query will be queried and returned as an instance of the native data type that this adapter supports. The iterator will only return as many results as the limit passed in.
        Parameters:
        adapter - the data adapter to use for the query
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        limit - The maximum number of entries to return
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • query

        <T> CloseableIterator<T> query(Index index,
                             Query query,
                             int limit)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter within the index described by the index passed in. All data types that match the query will be returned as an instance of the native data type that was originally ingested. The iterator will only return as many results as the limit passed in.
        Parameters:
        index - The index information to query against. All data within the index of this index ID will be queried and returned.
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        limit - The maximum number of entries to return
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • query

        <T> CloseableIterator<T> query(DataAdapter<T> adapter,
                             Index index,
                             Query query,
                             int limit)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter within the index described by the index passed in and matches the adapter (the same adapter ID as the ID ingested). All data that matches the query, adapter ID, and is in the index ID will be returned as an instance of the native data type that this adapter supports. The iterator will only return as many results as the limit passed in.
        Parameters:
        adapter - the data adapter to use for the query
        index - The index information to query against. All data within the index of this index ID will be queried and returned.
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        limit - The maximum number of entries to return
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • query

        CloseableIterator<?> query(List<ByteArrayId> adapterIds,
                         Query query,
                         int limit)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter and matches one of the adapter IDs. All data types that match the query and one of the adapter IDs will be returned as an instance of the native data type that was originally ingested. The iterator will only return as many results as the limit passed in.
        Parameters:
        adapterIds - The data adapter IDs to use for the query - only data that matches one of these adapter IDs will be returned
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        limit - The maximum number of entries to return
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • query

        <T> CloseableIterator<T> query(DataAdapter<T> adapter,
                             Index index,
                             Query query,
                             int limit,
                             String... authorizations)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter and matches one of the adapter IDs. All data types that match the query and one of the adapter IDs will be returned as an instance of the native data type that was originally ingested. The iterator will only return as many results as the limit passed in.
        Parameters:
        adapterIds - The data adapter IDs to use for the query - only data that matches one of these adapter IDs will be returned
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        limit - The maximum number of entries to return
        authorization - The authorization used to override the default authorization for cell visibility.
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • query

        <T> CloseableIterator<T> query(DataAdapter<T> adapter,
                             Index index,
                             Query query,
                             Integer limit,
                             ScanCallback<?> scanCallback,
                             String... authorizations)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter and matches one of the adapter IDs. All data types that match the query and one of the adapter IDs will be returned as an instance of the native data type that was originally ingested. The iterator will only return as many results as the limit passed in.
        Parameters:
        adapterIds - The data adapter IDs to use for the query - only data that matches one of these adapter IDs will be returned
        query - The description of the query to be performed
        limit - The maximum number of entries to return
        scanCallback - A callback invoked for each row with full row information.
        authorizations - The authorization used to override the default authorization for cell visibility.
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.
